website_summaries.verdict: Nice price for a standard-size unit. Includes 8 different game modes for versatility.
pros: Steel frame included with the arcade game folds up for storage
Nice size of unit for older kids to use
Takes a little while to put together, but it offers a nice level of durability

customer_reviews.title: would make an awesome present for any kid/family
customer_reviews.text: this bad boy is huge but it is a ton of fun!! we've even used it as a game at a carnival themed party and through all the wear and tear still has kept on ticking! only disclaimer is to put it together wherever your are planning to keep it cause moving it is a pain!!
customer_reviews.author: ZeedaBee

customer_reviews.title: This went together easily and our entire family loves it
customer_reviews.text: We had a problem with the backboard computer thing working. I wrote to them and they had a new little box shipped to our house so quickly. This went together easily and our entire family loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Marti

customer_reviews.title: It's Awesome If You Have The Space
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, strong, sturdy, and fun. It folds up to about half the length and everything works great. I read alot of reviews which made me hesitant to buy any of these games from ANY manufacturer, glad I settled on this one. One thing....make sure you have the room for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Cabassa

customer_reviews.title: So far this is a great product that has been a constant source of fun ...
customer_reviews.text: So far this is a great product that has been a constant source of fun for my 10 year olds and their friends! Assembly was fairly easy and for the most part intuitive, and having a video available on Amazon was a nice plus. However, there are some aspects of the instructions that could be improved to be consistent with the newer design. I discovered this at the tail end of the installation that caused me some delays amidst the excitement of anxious boys. This is the only reason why I gave it 4/5 stars. Otherwise, it's a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rough Neck Chicken

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy....no customer support!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! The seller is no longer in business to service this product! Bought this for a birthday present for my sis. Assembled nicely but the score board was DOA. Tried to contact the number on the instructions for warranty and phone number was disconnected. Email went unanswered. Sadly for us, the return for Amazon was expires so we are stuck with a game that has no scoreboard!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Truszkowski

customer_reviews.title: Great Basketball Game!!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on schedule and packaged very well. It required 2 people to assemble and the directions were not very clear. But it was nice that there was an assembly video on Amazon. It's perfect for a basement/man cave. It has great game sound and great accuracy. Also, it's made with great quality and very heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Mel W

customer_reviews.title: Looks EXPENSIVE! Lol
customer_reviews.text: ONLY Con: Difficultly setting specific digital game settings AFTER assembly. Definitely, do not purchase if looking for specifically DIGITAL PERFORMANCE- BUT it’s AWESOME if looking for great price (affordable) Arcade style for kids and adults. Looks expensive! I’m single mom & put it together MYSELF without 2nd person (instructions required x2 persons). WATCH YOUTUBE VIDEO- Personally NEVER attempted to assemble anything like it before. Everyone agrees it’s a “really nice one”. My 11 year old son & his friends love it! Have to force my adult nephews to give the younger kids a turn. LoL... Honestly, found it easy to assemble, THANK GOODNESS!
customer_reviews.author: Oż

customer_reviews.title: Basketball trouble
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was on time. The piece that mounts underneath the goal which counts the baskets broke shortly after using it. It was too late to send it back. I had to go to a different company to order the correct parts. The ball also gets stuck on the goal a lot (due to how the net is resting near the goal).
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Broken electronic part STRAIGHT OUT THE BOX!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this a 5 star BUT THE “ELECTRONIC” part was NON-EXISTENT for me straight out of the box! Bought it for my nieces & nephew to play in our basement For Thanksgiving, but realized the control /score board never turned on after I finished assembling it. Tried new batteries x2 & no luck!... Also tried direct electric connection with an AC adaptor & didn’t turn on either. My brother & sister also tried with no luck. Kids kept asking, why it isn’t turning on!... they finally resolved to just manually counting as they made the basket.... could have paid a lot less for a non-electronic version.
customer_reviews.author: Afo

customer_reviews.title: ... the balls at the bottom of the game is horrible and both straps broke on the first day of ...
customer_reviews.text: The velcro that holds the balls at the bottom of the game is horrible and both straps broke on the first day of play. The backboard and unit itself is sturdy, but the netting and straps that surround the area where the balls fall is extremely cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Parts came defected with misaligned holes.
customer_reviews.text: Right out the box my wife noticed the hole for connecting base 3 to 5 would not line up. One whole is drilled at a 90 deg. The other at a 45... very disappointed as I’m currently on deployment and ordered this for my 3 sons to enjoy and help pass time.
customer_reviews.author: KEITH

customer_reviews.title: Fun arcade hoops game
customer_reviews.text: This arcade hoop set is a lot of fun. Adults and kids both love having challenges. It’s fun to walk by and throw a couple of balls. It wasn’t that bad to assemble either. Would definitely recommend. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MISHMANKA

customer_reviews.title: Electronic scorer doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to set up, though it took time. The only disappointment for us was that the electronic scorer didn't work. So there's no electronic component working when we play. This actually was a major bummer. Amazon was unable to replace the part and I doubt Harvil is going to help us as they said all claims must be made through the retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Haas

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasantly surprised with this! I was afraid it would be flimsy or cheap but it’s definitely not! It’s very durable and fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey L.

customer_reviews.title: Works great and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had any problems with heavy use. The batteries have lasted longer than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Elbee

customer_reviews.title: My boys love this. However did break and I returned but ...
customer_reviews.text: My boys love this. However did break and I returned but hopefully new one will last and be a quality product! Will keep you posted.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Silva

customer_reviews.title: very pleased with the purchase!! family fun
customer_reviews.text: great purchase! bought for my husband as a surprise. fun for the whole family!! very pleased. sturdy and pretty good quality. I was worried it would be crappy, but it exceeded my expectations. 5 stars for the fun factor.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis & Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great product, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally write reviews. My 12 year old son purchased this with a gift card. I’m not the handiest person but was able to easily follow the instructions and had no issues putting it together. It seems very sturdy and good quality. It has been fun for the entire family - including my competitive son and 9 year old daughter. And I even got some games in. Great for time with family!
customer_reviews.author: Shari S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids and adults and hasn't malfunctioned yet!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use at our daughters' carnival-themed party. It was a huge hit at our house before the party and a huge hit at the party. The kids and their friends play with it now and it still sturdy and accurate. We bought it early November.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth L.

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: The part the balls fall in started to slump drastically leading to back pain.
customer_reviews.author: sha Tate

customer_reviews.title: It's fun to play with
customer_reviews.text: It is very very fun for the kid's right now since its not a lot for them to do but the whole family can play with it. It's also a good work out as wel. If you have kids and you thinking about getting it buy it you will love it
customer_reviews.author: Dianca smith

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor activity for everyone
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for our 9 year old grandson and seems to be the "gift" of the year. Uncle, 2 Pappy's, Dad, cousin, grandchild all seemed to be enthralled with this game. It took the adults about an hour to get it together but that was part of the bonding. We are really happy with the quality of the arcade.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, great competitive game for all ages
customer_reviews.text: We really like this basket ball game except for the fact that the electronics don't work all of the time. My husband has to get in the back where the electronics are, I'm not sure he knows for sure which is the one that makes it work again. It's sturdy, lots of fun. I think it's wort the money. It's just to bad that its not perfect, but then what is? Our grandsons love it, so do we, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: julia grimsley

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and had a blast with it at our company ...
customer_reviews.text: Well designed, sturdy and had a blast with it at our company event. Be careful if it's outside and it's windy. It holds up, but the wind can play havoc on the draped court.
customer_reviews.author: DeniseA

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: My piece that counts the score came bent in half doesn’t count scores at all and the other 1 broke smh and my cloth that the balls come down starting rippin apart the first few days
customer_reviews.author: Dupree  S Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome.. our group of kids at church love ...
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome..our group of kids at church love this and have so much fun!!! Great item!!!
customer_reviews.author: RaeRae

customer_reviews.title: Sterdy and bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Made an addition to my man cave, it's bigger than it looks. Solid construction can't wait for BBQ season to start.
customer_reviews.author: arthur Parker

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Good action for the size of the set up. Good for kids and good options .
customer_reviews.author: Bill O

customer_reviews.title: Just make sure that your kids are tall enough.
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons loved this hoop they could play all day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for young and old
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for our kids (13 and 11 years old) they love it!! Assembly was not difficult at all.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended. The kids are going to have fun with ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you! This is exactly what we desired!! Needed a little help from the seller and they came through immediately. Highly recommended. The kids are going to have fun with this for years - they are already doing so for the past three months now. Worth the price - enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: TMD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: grandkids love it when it rains and they are stuck inside
customer_reviews.author: readcharlie

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for nephew!
customer_reviews.text: Purchase for nephew as Christmas gift, he loves it. My brother said assembly wasnt bad. Will be buying one very soon for my kid, as a b day gift. Should keep him entertained. Great!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Minor

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Took about 3 hours to put together with 2 people
customer_reviews.author: Janet Nelson

customer_reviews.title: They loved it good and sturdy fast
customer_reviews.text: Ordered from my grandkids. They loved it good and sturdy fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: C.w

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Sound did not work scoreboard quit workin after two days Amazon was very good about getting a refund thanx amazon
customer_reviews.author: Joe miller

customer_reviews.title: All is good besides directions
customer_reviews.text: Good overall product. Absolutely confusing and horrible directions. Watch the YouTube video and save your time! Good quality overall once put together.
customer_reviews.author: Blong95

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 yo this Christmas. All 3 of my children ages 8,10 & 13 love this hoop. Very durable, easy to assemble and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad to put together if you have two adults. Scoreboard easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Baker

customer_reviews.title: Junk - unusable within a month
customer_reviews.text: Within a few weeks of receiving this product, both of the hoops were broken. Dazadi sent me replacement hoops but before we could get them up, the rest of the game collapsed under itself. We ended up throwing the whole thing away. Not only is it cheap, its obnoxious. I definitely do not recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Marie Martin

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this for my 5 year old for Christmas and ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 5 year old for Christmas and he absolutely LOVES it. We have games on here DAILY and he also enjoys it with his cousin and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Terry K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Me and my kids have a blast playing with this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all
customer_reviews.text: Well fun for all who can reach the balls. 3 of our 4 kids love this! I found my husband playing many times instead of working! Overall has been in great working condition since Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This has withstood hours/days/weeks/months of my son and his friends playing it. It takes some time assembling but it is worth it. This is a good sturdy frame with a canvas material that can take the constant battering of the basketballs without tearing at the seams.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: It’s made good
customer_reviews.text: These was bigger then I expected which was great! It’s vwry nice
customer_reviews.author: Bulletproof80

customer_reviews.title: Great for the whole family!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: No issues at all! Easy to assemble - 30 minutes to an hour. I had my 7 year old help me a little with the assembly. The only issue was I didn't find the needle for the pump. No big deal. Overall, this product is great. I had 4 boys and they play this thing every day. If I could give 10 Stars I would!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Farrell

customer_reviews.title: poor quality - horrible assembly instruction sheet
customer_reviews.text: The quality is poor, and the assembly instrcution sheet is absloutely useless. The screws provided are too small, the tools provided are too small to handle and too weak. The basket rings broke after 2nd day of usage. customer service was not helpful in resolving the issue, instead i was told i will be contacted at a later date which never happened until i called again and was told the same thing again.
customer_reviews.author: robert-nathan

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product
customer_reviews.text: As we started to unpack the product we noticed the pin for the pump was missing, then we noticed it had another part missing. The staw that broke the camels back was the final piece that we had to drill 2 holes in because it did not have them pre-drilled. After all was said and done it is a nice product when it has all the pieces properly packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Good size for anyone over 4'8 easy to assemble, the pump is a Lil bit of work but easy to use
customer_reviews.author: cheryl osullivan

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it's great.
customer_reviews.text: The twin boys quickly broke off the electronic score board. Other than that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The electing score keeper never worked, even right out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Paul Thouin

customer_reviews.title: Less than 1-week use
customer_reviews.text: Loved at first, but less than a week I'm waiting on a call back from CS. 2 support welds on one rim have come loose.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a short time
customer_reviews.text: It was fun but not durable. The rims bent and then break after about 2 months. It was fun while it lasted. We will be contacting Harvil to see if we can get new rims.
customer_reviews.author: Anand Murthi

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Junk
customer_reviews.text: Cheap score keeper did not work out of the box. What is the point of the game if the score keeper does not work?
customer_reviews.author: Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Kepps them comig!
customer_reviews.text: The kids have a terrific time with this and so do the adults. Assembly was not to difficult. It is sturdy and stands up under use.
customer_reviews.author: Trinity

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Liked the product but they sent a defective scoreboard with the hoop. Had to call and have another sent, to their credit I did get a replacement but hard to believe they sent a scoreboard with buttons missing.????
customer_reviews.author: Matt Smith

customer_reviews.title: A Winner!
customer_reviews.text: Hours and hours of entertainment for big kids (adults) and small. Smaller than some models, it fit into our basement perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Mom

customer_reviews.title: Harvil Double Swish
customer_reviews.text: Seller was awesome at getting this product to me quickly. All parts and instructions were accounted for. Setup was not difficult, but did take more than two hands at some points of assembly. My only complaint is that the laser counter for the left hoop does not accurately count the made baskets. I have tried to re-assemble it, tighten all necessary items and even move the net to no avail it still doesn't record the appropriate number of made baskets.
customer_reviews.author: Jon D.

customer_reviews.title: Great hoop! Is smaller than some of the other ...
customer_reviews.text: Great hoop! Is smaller than some of the other larger ones on amazon so it fits great in our playroom and perfect for my 3 year old. He loves it and plays with it daily
customer_reviews.author: Sheshe4

customer_reviews.title: Rating for basketball toy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandsons for Christmas last year. They absolutely loved it. Both boys are into every sport you can think of. It was worth every penny that I paid for this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea M. Sparks

customer_reviews.title: It's fun. It's sturdy and just like the arcade
customer_reviews.text: The kids won't stop playing. It's fun. It's sturdy and just like the arcade!
customer_reviews.author: Emily B Yasmer

product_meta.title: Harvil Double-Swish Electronic Basketball Game with 8 Game Options, Six 7-Inch Basketballs, 2 Steel Rims and Inflation Pump
feature_bullets: DURABLE AND CAN BE STORED EASILY - This electronic basketball arcade game is fitted with a backboard made of sturdy wood, powder-coated steel tubing frame with a black sand finish for maximum stability. Plus, you can choose from 8 games with the electronic scoring system. Ideal for indoor use and can be folded and stored conveniently. Assembled dimensions: 81 L x 41 W x 81 H inches / Weight: 49.28 pounds.

NEW COOL DESIGN AND FEATURES - The basketball wood floor is prominently featured in the new 3-ply ball return cloth design. The 3-point line entices players to pop a shot for hours of fun. When the fun gets rowdy the scoring machine unit and its wire stays safe and out of sight.

COMPLETE WITH ACCESSORIES and A CLEAR ASSEMBLY MANUAL - Grab a buddy and follow the concise assembly manual in setting-up this pop a shot basketball game. Start playing ball with the six 7-inch basketballs, 2 steel hoops, 2 white nylon basketball nets plus an inflation pump to keep those balls ready for play.

MANUFACTURER WARRANTY - Your machine will arrive with all the necessary parts, without defect and/or shipping damage. Well ship new replacement parts or an entirely new table at no cost in the event of defect or damage. If you still arent satisfied, youll get a full refund. All our items ship at no cost to your door, but we also offer in-home delivery and assembly for an added fee. In the 90-day warranty period, we will repair or replace defective parts at no cost to the purchaser.

DESIGNED AND ENGINEERED BY HARVIL - All Harvil items are designed and engineered by creative people right here in the USA. We are a family business and we design our products to be enjoyed by family and friends. Even though many of these items are manufactured in Asia, we are proud to have Americans who understand Americans needs bringing our items to life.
